post.description: Creates a new Gallery post and allows for multiple image uploads.

parameters.description: ID of the Gallery post to retrieve

put.description: Updates a Gallery post in the database using its ID. Allows updating the title, description, and images.

parameters.description: Updated images for the Gallery post. Multiple files can be uploaded.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Updated description for the Gallery post

200.description: Successful update of the Gallery post

delete.summary: Delete a specific Gallery post by ID
delete.description: Deletes a Gallery post from the database using its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Gallery post to delete
